content: 3 pattern brim with us 9/5 5mm 16 circular needles co 56 64 72 using the long tail method or your preferred method join in the round and place bor marker r1-9 k2 p2 to marker change to larger needles body knit in stockinette st until desired length from cast on approximately 6 5-7 is a decent length for adult sized adjust length accordingly for teens and kids decrease change to magic loop or dpns when stitches feel too tight around get some stitch markers ready divide the cast on number you ve used by a multiple of 8 set up round k7 8 9 pm repeat to bor marker r1 k to last 2 sts before marker k2tog last 2 sts repeat to bor marker r2 k all sts repeat r1&r2 until you have 2 sts remaining between each st marker if you decrease to 1 st between each marker the crown will end up pointy this is certainly an option though cut yarn leaving an 8 tail use a tapestry needle and weave yarn through remaining loops pull tightly and cinch top of hat to close weave in all ends i would love to see what you create please tag me on instagram @wanded527 or #sfocatobeanie feel free to contact me with any questions email wanded527@gmail com website https //www wandedknitandcrochet com ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/wanded527/ payhip https //www payhip com/wanded527 instagram https //www instagram com/wanded527/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/wanded527/ facebook https //www facebook com/wandedknitandcrochet copyright © wanded knit and crochet 2024 all photos and instructions are property of wanded knit and crochet please do not publish or share this patter n as your own you may make and sell items using this pattern but please give credit to jenny noto/ wanded knit and crochet
